name: vessel-of-ruin
effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.
short_effect: Lowers Special Attack of all Pokémon except itself.
flavor_text: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.
